Name: Dead Man's Mule
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer
Instructions: SHAKE first four ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.
Review: Strong in every respect. Big, full-on flavours of aniseed, cinnamon and ginger.
History: Discovered in 2003 at the Met bar, London, England. A detailed history of the Moscow Mule cocktail , of which this drink is a variant, can be found on our page.
Nutrition: One serving of Dead Man's Mule contains 227 calories
